scriptinfo.init: local tbl = {['AMGPack'] = {['1'] = 27091275, ['2'] = 28796661}, ['Radio'] = {['1'] = 21946873, ['2'] = 29043331}} local rs = game:GetService('ReplicatedStorage') local players = game:GetService('Players') local productInfo = require(rs.Modules.ProductInfo) local event = rs.Analytics.UpdateProductInfo for name, val in pairs(tbl) do local realVal = {} table.insert(realVal, 1, val['1']) table.insert(realVal, 2, val['2']) productInfo.Gamepasses[name] = realVal event:FireAllClients(name, realVal) end players.PlayerAdded:Connect(function(plr) for name, val in pairs(tbl) do local realVal = {} table.insert(realVal, 1, val['1']) table.insert(realVal, 2, val['2']) event:FireClient(plr, name, realVal) end end)
